query:
SELECT r.id as "id!: Uuid",
                      r.path,
                      r.name,
                      r.created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                      r.updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
               FROM repos r
               JOIN project_repos pr ON r.id = pr.repo_id
               WHERE pr.project_id = $1
               ORDER BY r.name ASC
